column3: was a narrow sound between [[Helcaraxë|Helkaraksë]] and the [[Great Lands]]. The region only appears in the ''[[The Book of Lost Tales (disambiguation)|Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref>{{HM|LT1}}</ref><ref>{{HM|LT2}}</ref>

column1: The first element in the [[Qenya]] name ''Qerkaringa'' is likely ''qerka'' ("throat").<ref>{{PE|16}}
